warningsAndPrecautions: ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 500 mg available oval shaped , white film-coated tablets , debossed “ y102 ” one side . ndc : 70518-4229-00 ndc : 70518-4229-01 ndc : 70518-4229-02 ndc : 70518-4229-03 ndc : 70518-4229-04 packaging : 14 1 bottle plastic packaging : 20 1 blister pack packaging : 20 1 bottle plastic packaging : 30 1 blister pack packaging : 14 1 blister pack store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . preserve well-closed container . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762

warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 500 mg are available as oval shaped, white film-coated tablets, debossed with “Y102” on one side.
